main.bio: I am an experienced MERN stack developer with experience in designing and developing web applications using ReactJS, NodeJS, Express, and MongoDB. but am not restricted to any specific technology. I consider myself a lifelong student, I never ever stop myself to learn new technology. Proficient in front-end and back-end development, API integrations, and responsive web design.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

education.description: Here I have completed my Full-Stack Web Development journey, achieved much more about how web development works and learnt how to learn by yourself.
I have completed my Bachelor of commerce(Specilized in computer application).

work.title: Web Developer Elearning System
work.description: For most of my internship in high school, I developed the e-learning system. Here I have had the opportunity to dig in and get my hands dirty with all the pieces of our software. I have worked with PHP assisted by CodeIgniter Framework and JavaScript
